subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: More cycling teams are racing clean, but pressure to win takes a toll on athletes’ health, says the author, a Canadian cyclist who has admitted to doping.
snippet: More cycling teams are racing clean, but pressure to win takes a toll on athletes’ health, says the author, a Canadian cyclist who has admitted to doping.
